verses.verse: הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> hal-Lu O praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> go-Yim; all ye nations שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ <WH7623> be-Chu-hu, praise כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH523> ha-'um-Mim. him all ye people

כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for גָ֘בַ֤ר <WH1396> ga-Var is great עָלֵ֨ינוּ׀ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu toward חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do, For his merciful וֶֽאֱמֶת־ <WH571> ve-'e-met- toward us and the truth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, [endureth] for ever הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
